short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tab manager similar to onetab and session buddy
short.zh_CN: 标签页管理插件, 功能类似于 onetab, session buddy

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Abookmark inbox is a tab manager similar to onetab and session buddy. It saves tabs as native bookmarks and they may be restored conveniently.

It is a subset of abookmark with some experimental features. 

Abookmark is the bookmark and tab manager, and it has many advanced features.  Abookmark inbox only contains the minimal features for tab management.
long.zh_CN:
Abookmark inbox 是一款标签页管理插件. 其功能类似于 onetab, session buddy. 可将标签页直接保存为原生书签, 并可方便的恢复.

Abookmark 是书签与标签页管理插件, 提供许多高级功能. Abookmark tab inbox 是abookmark的子集, 包含最基本的标签页管理功能.

本插件还包含一些实验性功能.
